topic.title: Data Hoarding
topic.body: Does anyone else do it?  If so, to what degree?  How much stuff do you have?  Plans?

1528353432_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: krak, you sir are an idiot.  Pedophilia is where wires in your brain get crossed.  It is a literal Mental Disorder, whereas homosexuality is due to inferior genes.

1527229050_1Kma1Pz9kBSHmDtK1iYtHTox14Edm.body: I hear the police outside.  I hear them everyday.  It wont be long now
